title: Kraken launches institutional arm aiming to cash in on Bitcoin ETFs
description:
The crypto exchange launched a new institutional-focused brand angling for more clients after the U.S. approved spot Bitcoin ETFs.

Crypto exchange Kraken has launched a new division to offer dedicated services to institutions as it angles for a piece of the Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF) pie.¬†

Kraken announced its new institutional brand on Feb. 27 that folds in its existing institutional offerings of spot and over-the-counter trading along with crypto staking¬†‚Äî for those outside the United States ‚Äî and is aiming it at asset managers, hedge funds, and high net-worth individuals.

Staked co-founder Tim Ogilvie, who joined Kraken when it acquired his firm in December 2021, will head Kraken Institutional and said in a statement that ‚Äúinstitutional adoption of crypto is growing rapidly.‚Äù

title: Ethereum Surges To New Highs As Market Activity Intensifies
description: The price of Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency, has continued its impressive rally, gaining over 6% today to reach a new high of $3,287. title: Meme Coin Dogwifhat (WIF) Surges To All-Time High Amid Crypto Market Rally
description: With Bitcoin (BTC) surpassing the $57,000 mark, reminiscent of its price levels at the end of 2021, the cryptocurrency market is experiencing a significant surge.
